customAction.title: Action object
customAction.description: Action object for a custom action button

action.description: Name of the action that the custom action button will execute

^[a-zA-Z_].+$.description: Specifies value to set for each field

debugMode.description: Is this JSON in debug mode?

elmType.description: The type of element to create

style.description: Specifies the style object for this element

^(?:[a-z]+(?:-[a-z]+)?|--inline-editor-b.description: Specifies style attributes for this element

align-items.description: Aligns flex items along the cross axis of the current line of the flex container.

align-self.description: Allows the default alignment along the cross axis to be overridden for individual flex items.

background-color.description: Sets the background color of an element.

background-image.description: Sets the background image(s) of an element.

border.description: Shorthand property for setting border width, style, and color.

border-bottom.description: Shorthand property for setting border width, style and color.

border-bottom-color.description: Sets the color of the bottom border.

border-bottom-left-radius.description: Defines the radii of the bottom left outer border edge.

border-bottom-right-radius.description: Defines the radii of the bottom right outer border edge.

border-bottom-style.description: Sets the style of the bottom border.

border-bottom-width.description: Sets the thickness of the bottom border.

border-color.description: The color of the border around all four edges of an element.

border-left.description: Shorthand property for setting border width, style and color

border-left-color.description: Sets the color of the left border.

border-left-style.description: Sets the style of the left border.

border-left-width.description: Sets the thickness of the left border.

border-radius.description: Defines the radii of the outer border edge.

border-right.description: Shorthand property for setting border width, style and color

border-right-color.description: Sets the color of the right border.

border-right-style.description: Sets the style of the right border.

border-right-width.description: Sets the thickness of the right border.

border-spacing.description: The lengths specify the distance that separates adjoining cell borders. If one length is specified, it gives both the horizontal and vertical spacing. If two are specified, the first gives the horizontal spacing and the second the vertical spacing. Lengths may not be negative.

border-style.description: The style of the border around edges of an element.

border-top.description: Shorthand property for setting border width, style and color

border-top-color.description: Sets the color of the top border.

border-top-left-radius.description: Defines the radii of the top left outer border edge.

border-top-right-radius.description: Defines the radii of the top right outer border edge.

border-top-style.description: Sets the style of the top border.

border-top-width.description: Sets the thickness of the top border.

border-width.description: Shorthand that sets the four 'border-*-width' properties. If it has four values, they set top, right, bottom and left in that order. If left is missing, it is the same as right; if bottom is missing, it is the same as top; if right is missing, it is the same as top.

bottom.description: Specifies how far an absolutely positioned box's bottom margin edge is offset above the bottom edge of the box's 'containing block'.

box-decoration-break.description:
Specifies whether individual boxes are treated as broken pieces of one continuous box, or whether each box is individually wrapped with the border and padding.
Browsers: Firefox 32, Safary 6.1, Chrome 22, Opera 15

box-shadow.description: Attaches one or more drop-shadows to the box. The property is a comma-separated list of shadows, each specified by 2-4 length values, an optional color, and an optional 'inset' keyword. Omitted lengths are 0; omitted colors are a user agent chosen color.

box-sizing.description: Specifies the behavior of the 'width' and 'height' properties.

caption-side.description: Specifies the position of the caption box with respect to the table box.

clear.description: Indicates which sides of an element's box(es) may not be adjacent to an earlier floating box. The 'clear' property does not consider floats inside the element itself or in other block formatting contexts.

clip.description: Deprecated. Use the 'clip-path' property when support allows. Defines the visible portion of an element’s box.

column-count.description: Describes the optimal number of columns into which the content of the element will be flowed.

column-fill.description:
In continuous media, this property will only be consulted if the length of columns has been constrained. Otherwise, columns will automatically be balanced.
Browsers: Edge 12, Firefox 52, Chrome

column-gap.description: Sets the gap between columns. If there is a column rule between columns, it will appear in the middle of the gap.

column-rule.description: Shorthand for setting 'column-rule-width', 'column-rule-style', and 'column-rule-color' at the same place in the style sheet. Omitted values are set to their initial values.

column-rule-color.description: Sets the color of the column rule

column-rule-style.description: Sets the style of the rule between columns of an element.

column-rule-width.description: Sets the width of the rule between columns. Negative values are not allowed.

columns.description: A shorthand property which sets both 'column-width' and 'column-count'.

column-span.description: Describes the page/column break behavior after the generated box.

column-width.description: Describes the width of columns in multicol elements.

cursor.description: Allows control over cursor appearance in an element

direction.description: Specifies the inline base direction or directionality of any bidi paragraph, embedding, isolate, or override established by the box. Note: for HTML content use the 'dir' attribute and 'bdo' element rather than this property.

display.description: In combination with 'float' and 'position', determines the type of box or boxes that are generated for an element.

empty-cells.description: In the separated borders model, this property controls the rendering of borders and backgrounds around cells that have no visible content.

fill.description: Paints the interior of the given graphical element.

flex.description: Specifies the components of a flexible length: the flex grow factor and flex shrink factor, and the flex basis.

flex-direction.description: Specifies how flex items are placed in the flex container, by setting the direction of the flex container’s main axis.

flex-flow.description: Specifies how flexbox items are placed in the flexbox.

flex-grow.description: Sets the flex grow factor. Negative numbers are invalid.

flex-shrink.description: Sets the flex shrink factor. Negative numbers are invalid.

flex-wrap.description: Controls whether the flex container is single-line or multi-line, and the direction of the cross-axis, which determines the direction new lines are stacked in.

float.description: Specifies how a box should be floated. It may be set for any element, but only applies to elements that generate boxes that are not absolutely positioned.

font.description: Shorthand property for setting 'font-style', 'font-variant', 'font-weight', 'font-size', 'line-height', and 'font-family', at the same place in the style sheet. The syntax of this property is based on a traditional typographical shorthand notation to set multiple properties related to fonts.

font-family.description: Specifies a prioritized list of font family names or generic family names. A user agent iterates through the list of family names until it matches an available font that contains a glyph for the character to be rendered.

enum: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', sans-serif
Cambria, Cochin, Georgia, Times, 'Times New Roman', serif
'Gill Sans', 'Gill Sans MT', Calibri, 'Trebuchet MS', sans-serif
'Lucida Sans', 'Lucida Sans Regular', 'Lucida Grande', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', Geneva, Verdana, sans-serif
'Trebuchet MS', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Lucida Grande', 'Lucida Sans', Arial, sans-serif

font-size.description: Indicates the desired height of glyphs from the font. For scalable fonts, the font-size is a scale factor applied to the EM unit of the font. (Note that certain glyphs may bleed outside their EM box.) For non-scalable fonts, the font-size is converted into absolute units and matched against the declared font-size of the font, using the same absolute coordinate space for both of the matched values.

font-size-adjust.description:
Preserves the readability of text when font fallback occurs by adjusting the font-size so that the x-height is the same irregardless of the font used.
Browsers: Firefox 40, Chrome 43, Opera 30

font-stretch.description: Selects a normal, condensed, or expanded face from a font family.

font-style.description: Allows italic or oblique faces to be selected. Italic forms are generally cursive in nature while oblique faces are typically sloped versions of the regular face.

font-variant.description: Specifies variant representations of the font

font-weight.description: Specifies weight of glyphs in the font, their degree of blackness or stroke thickness.

height.description: Specifies the height of the content area, padding area or border area (depending on 'box-sizing') of certain boxes.

justify-content.description: Aligns flex items along the main axis of the current line of the flex container.

left.description: Specifies how far an absolutely positioned box's left margin edge is offset to the right of the left edge of the box's 'containing block'.

letter-spacing.description: Specifies the minimum, maximum, and optimal spacing between grapheme clusters.

line-height.description: Determines the block-progression dimension of the text content area of an inline box.

margin.description: Shorthand property to set values the thickness of the margin area. If left is omitted, it is the same as right. If bottom is omitted it is the same as top, if right is omitted it is the same as top. Negative values for margin properties are allowed, but there may be implementation-specific limits.

margin-bottom.description: Shorthand property to set values the thickness of the margin area. If left is omitted, it is the same as right. If bottom is omitted it is the same as top, if right is omitted it is the same as top. Negative values for margin properties are allowed, but there may be implementation-specific limits..

margin-left.description: Shorthand property to set values the thickness of the margin area. If left is omitted, it is the same as right. If bottom is omitted it is the same as top, if right is omitted it is the same as top. Negative values for margin properties are allowed, but there may be implementation-specific limits..

margin-right.description: Shorthand property to set values the thickness of the margin area. If left is omitted, it is the same as right. If bottom is omitted it is the same as top, if right is omitted it is the same as top. Negative values for margin properties are allowed, but there may be implementation-specific limits..

margin-top.description: Shorthand property to set values the thickness of the margin area. If left is omitted, it is the same as right. If bottom is omitted it is the same as top, if right is omitted it is the same as top. Negative values for margin properties are allowed, but there may be implementation-specific limits..

max-height.description: Allows authors to constrain content height to a certain range.

max-width.description: Allows authors to constrain content width to a certain range.

min-height.description: Allows authors to constrain content height to a certain range.

min-width.description: Allows authors to constrain content width to a certain range.

opacity.description: Opacity of an element's text, where 1 is opaque and 0 is entirely transparent.

overflow-x.description: Specifies the handling of overflow in the horizontal direction.

overflow-y.description: Specifies the handling of overflow in the vertical direction.

padding.description: Shorthand property to set values the thickness of the padding area. If left is omitted, it is the same as right. If bottom is omitted it is the same as top, if right is omitted it is the same as top. The value may not be negative.

padding-bottom.description: Shorthand property to set values the thickness of the padding area. If left is omitted, it is the same as right. If bottom is omitted it is the same as top, if right is omitted it is the same as top. The value may not be negative.

padding-left.description: Shorthand property to set values the thickness of the padding area. If left is omitted, it is the same as right. If bottom is omitted it is the same as top, if right is omitted it is the same as top. The value may not be negative.

padding-right.description: Shorthand property to set values the thickness of the padding area. If left is omitted, it is the same as right. If bottom is omitted it is the same as top, if right is omitted it is the same as top. The value may not be negative.

padding-top.description: Shorthand property to set values the thickness of the padding area. If left is omitted, it is the same as right. If bottom is omitted it is the same as top, if right is omitted it is the same as top. The value may not be negative.

right.description: Specifies how far an absolutely positioned box's right margin edge is offset to the left of the right edge of the box's 'containing block'.

table-layout.description: Controls the algorithm used to lay out the table cells, rows, and columns.

text-align.description: Describes how inline contents of a block are horizontally aligned if the contents do not completely fill the line box.

text-align-last.description:
Describes how the last line of a block or a line right before a forced line break is aligned when 'text-align' is set to 'justify'.
Browsers: Edge 12, Firefox 49, Chrome 47, Internet Explorer, Opera

text-decoration.description: Decorations applied to font used for an element's text.

text-indent.description: Specifies the indentation applied to lines of inline content in a block. The indentation only affects the first line of inline content in the block unless the 'hanging' keyword is specified, in which case it affects all lines except the first.

text-justify.description:
Selects the justification algorithm used when 'text-align' is set to 'justify'. The property applies to block containers, but the UA may (but is not required to) also support it on inline elements.
Browsers: Edge 14, Firefox 55, Chrome, Internet Explorer 11, Opera

text-shadow.description: Enables shadow effects to be applied to the text of the element.

text-transform.description: Controls capitalization effects of an element’s text.

top.description: Specifies how far an absolutely positioned box's top margin edge is offset below the top edge of the box's 'containing block'.

unicode-bidi.description: The level of embedding with respect to the bidirectional algorithm.

vertical-align.description: Affects the vertical positioning of the inline boxes generated by an inline-level element inside a line box.

visibility.description: Specifies whether the boxes generated by an element are rendered. Invisible boxes still affect layout (set the ‘display’ property to ‘none’ to suppress box generation altogether).

white-space.description: Shorthand property for the 'white-space-collapsing' and 'text-wrap' properties.

width.description: Specifies the width of the content area, padding area or border area (depending on 'box-sizing') of certain boxes.

word-break.description: Specifies line break opportunities for non-CJK scripts.

word-wrap.description: Specifies whether the UA may break within a word to prevent overflow when an otherwise-unbreakable string is too long to fit.

z-index.description: For a positioned box, the 'z-index' property specifies the stack level of the box in the current stacking context and whether the box establishes a local stacking context.

hanging-punctuation.description:
The hanging-punctuation CSS property specifies whether a punctuation mark should hang at the start or end of a line of text. Hanging punctuation may be placed outside the line box.
Browsers: Safary 10

attributes.description: Additional attributes to be added to elmType

rel.description: Specifies the relationship between the current document and the linked document, used primarily for <a> element types.

target.description: Specifies the target attribute, used primarily for <a> element types.

role.description: Specifies the role attribute, used accessibility.

iconName.description: Specifies the Fabric icon to display before this element

d.description: Specifies the d attribute. Used primarily for svg path elements

^aria\\-[a-z]+$.description: Specifies aria- attributes for the element

forEach.description: For loop properties. The element will be rendered repeatedly based on an array.

defaultHoverField.description: Column name to show the default hover card of

customCardProps.description: Object that defines custom card props on hover/click

openOnEvent.description: Event name to decide on which the customCard should open

directionalHint.description: Specify the direction relative to the target in which CustomCard will be positioned

isBeakVisible.description: Specify if the beak is to be shown or not

beakStyle.description: Specifies the style object for custom card's beak

^[a-z]+(?:-[a-z]+)?$.description: Specifies style attributes for for custom card's beak

formatter.description: JSON object that defines formatting for customCards

columnFormatterReference.description: Referring the column formatter of specified field

inlineEditField.description: Allow inline editing for a field
